ISSUE.TITLE: Install nocodb with mysql error. Shows "services.nocodb.depends_on contains an invalid type" inside docker-compose.yml
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I use: NocoDB used as docker : yes, I try to install the instance with docker-compose NocoDB version : latest (cloned from github today) - commit: c50435c Database used in NC_DB URL: mysql OS on which NocoDB is running : ubuntu 16.04 Node.js version if running as node : 16.13.1 Database version : Mysql 5.7.33 **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Follow the part https://docs.nocodb.com/getting-started/installation/#docker-compose 2. Launch: sudo docker-compose up 3. See error: ``` ERROR: The Compose file './docker-compose.yml' is invalid because: services.nocodb.depends_on contains an invalid type, it should be an array ``` **Expected behavior** I expect there will not be errors
